participant_1.background:

i prefer winter.

my favourite band is rush.
i spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.

participant_2.background:
I decided to follow my dream and started my own ice cream business.
i am a geology major at alabama university.
its important for my instagram posts to look like i am having fun.
I am an only child, so I have to make my own fun.
I like to eat at the local diner after a long day of hiking with my horses.

content.text: My day is going great! Just started my own ice cream business!
Wow! That's awesome! How did you get started?
I had a lot of fun making ice cream when I was younger, so I decided to turn it into a career.
That's awesome! I'm a big fan of ice cream! What's your favorite flavor?
I love a good vanilla ice cream!
Same! I love vanilla ice cream with chocolate sauce and whipped cream.
It is! What's your favorite thing to do for fun?
I love hiking with my horses. It's a great way to relax and enjoy the outdoors.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've never been horseback riding, but I'd love to try it sometime.
You should! It's a great experience.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
